items.title: HON Q1 Earnings Call: Honeywell Tops Expectations, Focuses on Spin-Offs and Tariff Mitigation
items.description: Industrial conglomerate Honeywell (NASDAQ:HON) reported Q1 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.9% year on year to $9.82 billion. On the other hand, the company’s full-year revenue guidance of $40.05 billion at the midpoint came in 0.7% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.51 per share was 13.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

items.title: Honeywell International Inc. stock rises Monday, still underperforms market

items.title: Vertical Aerospace plans long-range hybrid air-taxi variant to widen market reach
items.description: Vertical Aerospace said onMonday it is developing a long-range hybrid-electric variant ofits air-taxi VX4, aiming to expand into commercial marketsincluding defense and logistics. ...
